trans-unit.source: Cuts or copies one or multiple cells, rows or columns to a range or from/to the clipboard

seg-source.mrk: Cuts or copies one or multiple cells, rows or columns to a range or from/to the clipboard

target.mrk: Cuts or copies one or multiple cells, rows or columns to a range or from/to the clipboard

trans-unit.source: Source range to copy/cut from. Can be a range object or an A1 range.

seg-source.mrk: Can be a range object or an A1 range.

target.mrk: Can be a range object or an A1 range.

trans-unit.source: If set to keyword Default then the range will be copied from the clipboard.

seg-source.mrk: If set to keyword Default then the range will be copied from the clipboard.

target.mrk: If set to keyword Default then the range will be copied from the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Target range to copy/cut to. Can be a range object or an A1 range.

seg-source.mrk: Can be a range object or an A1 range.

target.mrk: Can be a range object or an A1 range.

trans-unit.source: If set to keyword Default then the range will be copied to the clipboard (default = keyword Default)

seg-source.mrk: If set to keyword Default then the range will be copied to the clipboard (default = keyword Default)

target.mrk: If set to keyword Default then the range will be copied to the clipboard (default = keyword Default)

trans-unit.source: [optional] If set to True the source range isn't copied but cut out (default = False)

seg-source.mrk: If set to True the source range isn't copied but cut out (default = False)

target.mrk: If set to True the source range isn't copied but cut out (default = False)

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored when $vSourceRange is set to keyword Default.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter is ignored when $vSourceRange is set to keyword Default.

target.mrk: This parameter is ignored when $vSourceRange is set to keyword Default.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The part of the range to be pasted from the clipboard (formulas, formats ...). Must be a value of the XlPasteType enumeration

seg-source.mrk: The part of the range to be pasted from the clipboard (formulas, formats ...).
Must be a value of the XlPasteType enumeration

target.mrk: The part of the range to be pasted from the clipboard (formulas, formats ...).
Must be a value of the XlPasteType enumeration

trans-unit.source: [optional] The paste operation (add, divide, multiply ...). Must be a value of the XlPasteSpecialOperation enunmeration

seg-source.mrk: Must be a value of the XlPasteSpecialOperation enunmeration

target.mrk: Must be a value of the XlPasteSpecialOperation enunmeration

trans-unit.source: [optional] If set to True blank cells from the clipboard will not be pasted into the target range (default = False)

seg-source.mrk: If set to True blank cells from the clipboard will not be pasted into the target range (default = False)

target.mrk: If set to True blank cells from the clipboard will not be pasted into the target range (default = False)

trans-unit.source: [optional] Set to True to transpose rows and columns when the range is pasted (default = False)

seg-source.mrk: Set to True to transpose rows and columns when the range is pasted (default = False)

target.mrk: Set to True to transpose rows and columns when the range is pasted (default = False)

trans-unit.source: the object of the target range if $vTargetRange <> Default, else 1.

seg-source.mrk: the object of the target range if $vTargetRange <> Default, else 1.

target.mrk: the object of the target range if $vTargetRange <> Default, else 1.

trans-unit.source: 1 - $oWorksheet is not an object or not a worksheet object

seg-source.mrk: 1 - $oWorksheet is not an object or not a worksheet object

target.mrk: 1 - $oWorksheet is not an object or not a worksheet object

trans-unit.source: 2 - $vSourceRange is invalid. @extended is set to the COM error code

seg-source.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

target.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

trans-unit.source: 3 - $vTargetRange is invalid. @extended is set to the COM error code

seg-source.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

target.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

trans-unit.source: 4 - Error occurred when pasting cells. @extended is set to the COM error code

seg-source.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

target.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

trans-unit.source: 5 - Error occurred when cutting cells. @extended is set to the COM error code

seg-source.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

target.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

trans-unit.source: 6 - Error occurred when copying cells. @extended is set to the COM error code

seg-source.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

target.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code

trans-unit.source: 7 - $vSourceRange and $vTargetRange can't be set to keyword Default at the same time

seg-source.mrk: 7 - $vSourceRange and $vTargetRange can't be set to keyword Default at the same time

target.mrk: 7 - $vSourceRange and $vTargetRange can't be set to keyword Default at the same time

trans-unit.source: $vSourceRange and $vTargetRange can't be set to keyword Default at the same time.

seg-source.mrk: $vSourceRange and $vTargetRange can't be set to keyword Default at the same time.

target.mrk: $vSourceRange and $vTargetRange can't be set to keyword Default at the same time.

trans-unit.source: * the range will be copied from the clipboard using the PasteSpecial method

seg-source.mrk: * the range will be copied from the clipboard using the PasteSpecial method

target.mrk: * the range will be copied from the clipboard using the PasteSpecial method

trans-unit.source: If $vSourceRange and $vTargetRange are specified parameters $iPaste, $iOperation, $bSkipBlanks and $bTranspose are ignored
